bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.intro:
Hau [scarlet]Mindustry tutoriala[] da.
Hasi [accent]kobrea ustiatzen[]. Horretarako, sakatu zure muinetik hurbil dagoen kobre-mea bat.

[accent]{0}/{1} kobre
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorialean[] sartu zara
Pasatu hatza mugitzeko.
[accent]Egin atximurkada bi hatzekin [] zooma hurbildu edo urruntzeko.
Hasi[accent] kobrea ustiatuz[]. Hurbildu kobrera, gero sakatu zure muinetik hurbil dagoen kobre mea bat.

[accent]{0}/{1} kobre
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.drill:
Eskuz ustiatzea ez da eraginkorra.
[accent]Zulagailuek []automatikoki ustiatu dezakete.
Sakatu zulagailuen fitxa, behean eskuman.
Hautatu[accent] zulagailu mekanikoa[]. Kokatu ezazu kobre zain batean klik eginez.
[accent]Eskumako klik[] deseraikitzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Eskuz ustiatzea ez da eraginkorra.
[accent]Zulagailuek []automatikoki ustiatu dezakete.
Sakatu zulagailuen fitxa behean eskuman.
Hautatu[accent] zulagailu mekanikoa[]. 
Kokatu ezazu kobre zain batean sakatuz, gero sakatu azpiko [accent]egiaztapen-marka[] zure hautaketa berresteko.
Sakatu [accent]X botoia[] kokatzea ezeztatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Bloke bakoitzak estatistika desberdinak ditu. Eta zulagailu bakoitzak mea mota zehatz batzuk ustiatu ditzake soilik.
Bloke mota baten informazio eta estatistikak egiaztatzeko,[accent] hautatu blokea eraikiketa menuan eta sakatu "?" botoia .[]

[accent]Atzitu zulagailu mekanikoaren estatistikak orain.[]
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
Solidoak muinera garraiatzeko [accent]garraio-zintak[] erabiltzen dira.
Egin garraio-zinten errenkada bat zulagailutik muinera.
[accent]Mantendu sagua sakatuta garraio-zintak errenkadan kokatzeko.[]
Sakatu [accent]CTRL[] errenkada diagonalean eraikitzeko.

[accent]{0}/{1} garraio-zinta kokatuta errenkadan
[accent]0/1 baliabide entregatuta
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
Baliabideak muinera garraiatzeko [accent]garraio-zintak[] erabiltzen dira.
Egin garraio-zinten errenkada bat zulagailutik muinera.
[accent]Mantendu atzamarra segundo batzuk errenkadan [] eta arrastatu norabideren batean.

[accent]{0}/{1} garraiagailu kokatuta errenkadan
[accent]0/1 baliabide entregatuta
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.turret:
Behin baliabide bat zure muinean sartu dela, eraikuntzarako erabili daiteke.
Izan kontuan ezin direla baliabide mota guztiak erabili eraikuntzarako.
Eraikuntzarako erabili ezin daitezkeen baliabideak, esaterako [accent]ikatza[] edo [accent]txatarra[], ezin dira muinean sartu.
Defentsarako estrukturak eraiki behar dira [lightgray]etsaiari[] aurre egiteko.
Eraiki [accent]duo dorre bat[] zure basetik hurbil.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo dorreak [accent]kobrezko munizioa[] behar dute tirokatzeko.
Kokatu zulagailu bat dorretik hurbil.
Eraman garraio-zinta bat dorrea arte kobrea hornitzeko.

[accent]Entregatutako munizioa: 0/1
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.pause:
Borrokan zehar, [accent]jolasa pausatu[] dezakezu.
Eraikuntzak planifikatu ditzakezu pausatuta dagoela.

[accent]Sakatu zuriune-barra pausatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
Borrokan zehar, [accent]jolasa pausatu[] dezakezu.
Eraikuntzak planifikatu ditzakezu pausatuta dagoela.

[accent]Sakatu goi ezkerreko botoia pausatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Maiz blokeak suntsitu beharko dituzu.
[accent]Mantendu saguaren eskumako botoia[] hautaketa baten barruko bloke guztiak suntsitzeko.[]

[accent]Suntsitu zure muinetik ezkerrera dauden txatarra bloke guztiak eremu-hautaketarekin.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Maiz blokeak suntsitu beharko dituzu.
[accent]Hautatu deseraikitze modua[], gero sakatu bloke bat hau apurtzen hasteko.
Suntsitu eremu bat atzamarra segundo batzuk mantenduz[] eta norabideren batean arrastatuz.
Sakatu egiaztatze-marka suntsitzea berresteko.

[accent]Suntsitu zure muinetik ezkerrera dauden txatarra bloke guztiak eremu-hautaketarekin.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
Egoera batzuetan, blokeetatik zuzenean hartu behar dira baliabideak.
Horretarako, [accent]sakatu baliabideak dituen bloke bat[], gero [accent]sakatu baliabidea[] inbentarioan.
Hainbat baliabide ateratzeko [accent]sakatu eta mantendu[].

[accent]Atera kobre apur bat muinetik.[]
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.deposit: Baliabideak blokeren batean sartzeko, arrastatu zure ontzitik blokera.\n\n[accent]Sartu zure kobrea berriro muinean.[]
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.waves:
[lightgray]Etsaia[] dator.

Babestu muina 2 boladetan zehar. [accent]Egin klik[] tirokatzeko.
Eraiki dorre eta zulagailu gehiago. Ustiatu kobre gehiago.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
[lightgray]Etsaia[] dator.

Babestu muina 2 boladatan. Zure ontziak automatikoki tirokatuko ditu etsaiak.
Eraiki dorre eta zulagailu gehiago. Ustiatu kobre gehiago.
bundle_eu.properties.tutorial.launch:
Bolada zehatz batera heltzean, [accent]muina egotzi[] dezakezu, zure defentsak atzean utziz [accent]eta muineko baliabide guztiak eskuratuz.[]
Baliabide hauek teknologia berriak ikertzeko erabili daitezke.

[accent]Sakatu egotzi botoia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.copper.description: Egiturazko material oinarrizkoena. Asko erabilia bloke mota guztietarako.
bundle_eu.properties.item.lead.description: Hastapeneko oinarrizko materiala. Bloke elektronikoak eta likidoen garraiorako blokeetan asko erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.metaglass.description: Beirazko konposatu izugarri sendoa. Asko erabilia likidoen garraio eta biltegiratzerako.
bundle_eu.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralizatutako ikatza, munizioa eta isolamendu elektrikorako erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.sand.description: Galdaketan asko erabiltzen den material arrunta, aleazioetan zein urgarri gisa.
bundle_eu.properties.item.coal.description: Fosilizatutako gai begetala, panspermia baino askoz lehenago sortua. Asko erabilia erregai gisa eta baliabideak sortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.item.titanium.description: Metal oso arin eta urria. Asko erabilia likidoen garraiorako, zulagailuetan, eta hegazkinetan.
bundle_eu.properties.item.thorium.description: Metal trinko erradioaktiboa, euskarri estrukturalerako eta erregai nuklear gisa erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.scrap.description: Estruktura eta unitate zaharren hondakin. Metal desberdin askoren apurrak dauzka.
bundle_eu.properties.item.silicon.description: Erdieroale izugarri erabilgarria. Panel fotovoltaikoetan, elektronika konplexuan eta dorreen gidatutako munizioan erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.plastanium.description: Material arin eta harikorra aireontzi aurreratuetan eta fragmentazio-munizioan erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Ia pisurik gabeko substantzia elektronika aurreratuan eta auto-konponketan erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Ezaugarri elektriko bereziak dituen aleazio aurreratua.
bundle_eu.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Espora sintetikoen leka bat, erabilera industrialerako sintetizatua kontzentrazio atmosferikoetatik. Olioa, lehergailuak eta erregaia ekoizteko erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Bonba eta lehergailuetan erabilitako konposatu ezegonkorra. Espora lekak eta beste substantzia lurrinkorrekin sintetizatua. Erregai gisa erabiltzea ez da gomendagarria.
bundle_eu.properties.item.pyratite.description: Izugarri sukoia den substantzia, arma su-eragileetan erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.liquid.water.description: Likido erabilgarriena. Makinen hozgarri gisa eta hondakinen tratamenduan arrunt erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.liquid.slag.description: Urtutako mineral desberdinen batura. Bere jatorrizko mineraletara banatu daiteke, edo munizio gisa etsaiei ihinztatu.
bundle_eu.properties.liquid.oil.description: Material aurreratuen ekoizpenean erabilitako likidoa. Ikatz bihurtu daiteke erregai gisa erabiltzeko, edo arma gisa ihinztatu eta su emanda.
bundle_eu.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Ur eta titanioz egindako likido bizigabe eta ez korrosiboa. Beroa xurgatzeko gaitasun handia du. Hozgarri gisa maiz erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.block.message.description: Mezu bat gordetzen du. Aliatuen arteko komunikaziorako erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Ikatz puskak zanpatzen ditu grafito hutsezko xaflak sortuz.
bundle_eu.properties.block.multi-press.description: Grafito prentsaren bertsio hobetu bat. Ura eta energia behar ditu ikatza azkar eta eraginkorki prozesatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Hondarra eta ikatz hutsa txikitzen ditu silizioa sortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.kiln.description: Hondarra eta beruna galdatzen ditu metabeira izeneko konposatua sortzeko. Energia apur bat behar du jarduteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Plastanioa ekoizten du olioa eta titanioa erabiliz.
bundle_eu.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Fasezko ehuna sintetizatzen du torio erradioaktiboa eta hondarra erabiliz. Energia kopurua handia behar du jarduteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Titanioa, beruna, silizioa eta kobrea konbinatzen ditu tirain aleazioa ekoizteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Ura eta titanio hauts fina nahasten ditu krio-isurkia ekoizteko. Toriozko erreaktorea erabiltzeko ezinbestekoa.
bundle_eu.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Espora sortak eta piratita txikitu eta nahasten ditu lehergai konposatua ekoizteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Ikatza, beruna, eta hondarra nahasten ditu oso sukoia den piratita sortuz.
bundle_eu.properties.block.melter.description: Metala zepara urtzen du, prozesatzen jarraitzeko edo olatu dorreetan erabiltzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.separator.description: Zeparen osagai mineralak bereizten ditu. Hoztutako emaitza ateratzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.spore-press.description: Espora lekak zapaltzen ditu muturreko presioarekin olioa sintetizatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Olioa ikatz puska solidoetara bihurtzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.incinerator.description: Jasotzen duen edozein soberako elementu edo likido lurruntzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.power-void.description: Jasotako energia guztia deuseztatzen du. Jolastokian besterik ez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.power-source.description: Energia emari etengabea. Jolastokian besterik ez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.item-source.description: Elementuen iturri amaigabea. Jolastokian besterik ez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.item-void.description: Elementu guztiak suntsitzen ditu. Jolastokian besterik ez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Likidoen emari amaigabea. Jolastokian besterik ez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Babeserako bloke merke bat.\nMuina eta dorreak lehen boladetan babesteko erabilgarria.
bundle_eu.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Babeserako bloke merke bat.\nMuina eta dorreak lehen boladetan babesteko erabilgarria.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Zertxobait gogorra den babeserako bloke bat.\nEtsaien aurreko babes ertaina eskaintzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Zertxobait gogorra den babeserako bloke bat.\nEtsaien aurreko babes ertaina eskaintzen du.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Arku elektrikoak xurgatzen dituen eta energia-nodoen konexio automatikoak blokeatzen dituen horma berezia.
bundle_eu.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Arku elektrikoak xurgatzen dituen eta energia-nodoen konexio automatikoak blokeatzen dituen horma berezia..\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Babeserako bloke gogorra.\nEtsaitatik aterpe txukuna.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Fasez osatutako konposatu islatzaile batez estalitako horma bat. Talkan jasotako bala gehienak desbideratzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Fasez osatutako konposatu islatzaile batez estalitako horma bat. Talkan jasotako bala gehienak desbideratzen ditu.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Defentsarako bloke nabarmen iraunkorra.\nKarga hartzen du balakadak jasotzean, hau edonora askatuz.
bundle_eu.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Defentsarako bloke nabarmen iraunkorra.\nKarga hartzen du balakadak jasotzean, edonora askatuz.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.door.description: Ate txiki bat. Sakatuz ireki eta itxi daiteke.
bundle_eu.properties.block.door-large.description: Ate handi bat. Sakatuz ireki eta itxi daiteke.\nHainbat lauza hartzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.mender.description: Aldiro inguruko blokeak konpontzen ditu. Defentsak bere onean mantentzen ditu boladen artean.\nAukeran silizioa erabili dezake irismena eta eraginkortasuna hobetzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Bedeziaren bertsio hobetu bat. Inguruko blokeak konpontzen ditu.\nAukeran ehuna erabili dezake irismena eta eraginkortasuna hobetzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Inguruko eraikinen abiadura areagotzen du.\nAukeran Fasezko ehuna erabili dezake irismena eta eraginkortasuna hobetzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.force-projector.description: Indar eremu hexagonal bat sortzen du bere inguruan, barruko eraikin eta unitateak kaltetik babestuz.\nKalte gehiegi jasotzen badu gainberotu egiten da. Aukeran hozgarria erabili dezake gainberotzea eragozteko. Fasezko ehuna erabili daiteke babesaren neurria handitzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Mina zanpatzen duten etsaiak kaltetzen ditu. Etsaiarentzat ia ikusezina.
bundle_eu.properties.block.conveyor.description: Solidoak garraiatzeko oinarrizko blokea. Aurrera daramatza baliabideak eta automatikoki sartzen ditu blokeetan. Biratu daiteke.
bundle_eu.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Elementuen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Garraiagailu arruntek baino azkarrago daramatza elementuak.
bundle_eu.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_eu.properties.block.junction.description: Gurutzatutako bi garraio-zinten arteko zubi gisa aritzen da. Material desberdinak daramatzaten bi garraio-zinta gurutzatzen direnean erabilgarria.
bundle_eu.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Elementuen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Elementuak edozein gainazal edo eraikinen gainetik garraiatzen ditu 3 lauzatara gehienez.
bundle_eu.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Elementuen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Energia erabiltzen du hainbat lauzetara konektatutako beste Fasezko garraiagailu batera elementuak teleportatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.sorter.description: Elementuak antolatzen ditu. Elementu bat hautuarekin bat badator, aurrera jarraitu dezake. Bestela, elementua ezker eta eskuinera ateratzen da.
bundle_eu.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Antolatzaile arruntaren antzera prozesatzen ditu elementuak, baina hautatutako elementuak alboetara ateratzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.router.description: Elementuak onartzen ditu, eta beste gehienez 3 norabideetara ateratzen ditu kopuru berdinetan. Jatorri batetik hainbat xedeetara materialak banatzeko egokia.\n\n[scarlet]Ez jarri ekoizpen sarreren ondoan, irteerek trabatuko baitute.[]
bundle_eu.properties.block.distributor.description: Bideratzaile aurreratu bat. Elementuak beste gehienez 7 norabideetara sakabanatzen ditu kopuru berdinetan.
bundle_eu.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Antolatzaile eta bideratzaile konbinatua. Soilik aurrealdea blokeatuta dagoenean ateratzen du ezker eta eskuinera.
bundle_eu.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_eu.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Elementuen garraiorako bloke gorena. Hainbat elementu jaso eta beste mukulu-igorle bati jaurtitzen dizkio irismen handiarekin. Energia behar du jarduteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Ponpa merke bat, emari motelekoa baina ez du energiarik kontsumitzen.
bundle_eu.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Ponpa aurreratu bat. Likido gehiago barreiatzen du, baina energia behar du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.conduit.description: Likidoen garraiorako oinarrizko blokea. Likidoak daramatza. Ponpa eta bestelako hodiekin batera erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Likidoen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Hodi arruntek baino azkarrago garraiatzen ditu likidoak eta edukiera handiagoa du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_eu.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Likidoan alde batetik jaso eta gehienez beste 3 norabideetara ateratzen ditu kopuru berdinean. Likido apur bat ere biltegiratu dezake. Likidoak iturri batetik hainbat xedeetara eramateko erabilgarria.
bundle_eu.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Likidoen kopuru handi bat biltegiratzen du. Erabili tarteko biltegiratzerako materialen eskaria etengabekoa ez denean, edo ezinbesteko blokeentzako hozgarriaren gordailu gisa.
bundle_eu.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Gurutzatzen diren bi hodi banatzeko zubi gisa aritzen da. Likido desberdinak daramatzaten bi hodi gurutzatzen direnean erabilgarria.
bundle_eu.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Likidoen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Likidoak edozelako lurzoru edo eraikinen gainetik garraiatu ditzake, gehienez 3 lauzatara.
bundle_eu.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Likidoen garraiorako bloke aurreratua. Energia darabil likidoak hainbat lauzetara konektatutako beste fasezko hodi batera teleportatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.power-node.description: Konektatu nodoei energia igortzen die. Nodoa inguruko edozein blokeetara konektatuko da energia jaso edo igortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Energia nodo aurreratua, irismen handiagoarekin eta konexio gehiagorekin.
bundle_eu.properties.block.surge-tower.description: Muturreko irismen luzea duen energia-nodoa konexio erabilgarri gutxiagorekin.
bundle_eu.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_eu.properties.block.battery.description: Energia biltegiratu dezake gehiegi dagoenean tartekari gisa erabiltzeko. Behar denean energia igortzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.battery-large.description: Bateria arrunt batek baino energia gehiago biltegiratu dezake.
bundle_eu.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Energia sortzen du gai erregarriak errez, esaterako ikatza.
bundle_eu.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Energia sortzen du toki beroetan jarrita.
bundle_eu.properties.block.steam-generator.description: Errekuntza sorgailu aurreratu bat. Eraginkorragoa. baina ur gehiago behar du lurrina sortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Energia kopuru handia sortzen du. Krio-isurkaria eta piratita goriaren arteko tenperatura diferentzia erabiltzen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Sorgailu sinple eta fidagarria. Konposatu erradioaktiboen hirotzearen beroa erabiltzen du geldiro energia sortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Eguzkiaren energia kopuru txiki bat ematen du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Panel fotovoltaiko arruntaren bertsio nabarmen eraginkorrago bat.
bundle_eu.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Energia kopuru handia sortzen du torioa erabilita. Hozgarria behar du etengabe. Bortizki lehertuko da hozgarri nahikoa hornitzen ez bazaio. Energia emaria betetasunaren araberakoa da, erreferentziazko energia sorkuntza guztiz betea dagoenean da.
bundle_eu.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Sorgailu aurreratu bat, energia kopuru handia sortzeko gai bere gehienezko eraginkortasunean. Energia sarrera nabarmena behar du prozesua abian jartzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Zulagailu merke bat. Lauza egokietan kokatua, astiro baina etengabe aterako ditu baliabideak. Oinarrizko baliabideak ustiatu ditzake soilik.
bundle_eu.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Zulagailu hobetu bat, titanioa erauzteko gai. Zulagailu mekanikoak baino azkarrago ustiatzen du da.
bundle_eu.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Laser teknologiari esker azkarrago zulatu dezake, baina energia behar du. Torioa ustiatu dezake.
bundle_eu.properties.block.blast-drill.description: Zulagailu gorena. Energia kopuru handia behar du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Lurrazpiko ura erauzten du. Azalean urik ez dagoen tokietan erabilia.
bundle_eu.properties.block.cultivator.description: Atmosferako esporen kontzentrazio txikiak kultibatzen ditu industriarako erabilgarriak diren lekak sortzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Energia, hondar eta ur ugari behar du olioa erauzteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.core-shard.description: Muin kapsularen lehen iterazioa. Behin suntsituta, eremuarekin kontaktua erabat galduko da, ez utzi hau gertatzen.
bundle_eu.properties.block.core-foundation.description: Muinaren bigarren bertsioa. Hobeto blindatua. Baliabide gehiago gorde ditzake.
bundle_eu.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: Muin kapsularen hirugarren eta azken iterazioa. Bereziki ondo blindatua. Baliabide kopuru ikaragarriak biltegiratu ditzake.
bundle_eu.properties.block.vault.description: Mota bakoitzeko elementuen kopuru handiak biltegiratzen ditu. Bloke deskargagailu bat erabili daiteke elementuak kriptatik ateratzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.container.description: Mota bakoitzeko elementuen kopuru txiki bat gordetzen du. Bloke deskargagailu bat erabili daiteke elementuak edukiontzitik ateratzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.unloader.description: Edukiontzi, kripta edo muin batetik elementuak deskargatzen ditu garraiagailu batera edo zuzenean ondoan dagoen bloke batera. Deskargatu beharreko elementu mota sakatuz aldatu daiteke.
bundle_eu.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Baliabide multzoak egotzi ditzake muina egotzi gabe.
bundle_eu.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: Egozketa plataformaren bertsio aurreratu bat. Elementu gehiago biltegiratzen ditu. Maizago egozten du.
bundle_eu.properties.block.duo.description: Dorre txiki eta merke bat. Lurreko unitateen aurka erabilgarria.
bundle_eu.properties.block.scatter.description: Aire defentsarako ezinbesteko dorrea. Berun edo txatarrezko koskorrekin ihinztatzen ditu unitate etsaiak.
bundle_eu.properties.block.scorch.description: Inguruko lurreko etsaiak kiskaltzen ditu. Oso eraginkorra distantzia hurbilera.
bundle_eu.properties.block.wave.description: Neurri ertaineko dorrea. Likido jarioak isurtzen dizkie etsaiei. Suak automatikoki itzaltzen ditu ura hornitzen bazaio.
bundle_eu.properties.block.lancer.description: Lurreko unitateen aurkako laser dorre ertaina. Energia izpi indartsuak kargatu eta jaurtitzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.arc.description: Irismen hurbileko dorre elektriko txikia. Elektrizitate arkuak jaurtitzen dizkie etsaiei.
bundle_eu.properties.block.swarmer.description: Misil dorre ertaina. Lurrezko zein airezko etsaiak erasotzen ditu. Misil gidatuak jaurtitzen ditu.
bundle_eu.properties.block.salvo.description: Duo dorrearen bertsio handiago eta aurreratuago bat. Tiro-segida azkarrak botatzen dizkie etsaiei.
bundle_eu.properties.block.fuse.description: Irismen hurbileko energia dorre handia. Hiru izpi zulatzaile isurtzen dizkie inguruko etsaiei.
bundle_eu.properties.block.ripple.description: Kanoiteria dorre izugarri indartsua. Obus sortak jaurtitzen dizkie etsaiei distantzia urrunetara.
bundle_eu.properties.block.cyclone.description: Aire zein lurreko defentsarako dorre handia. Torpedo lehergarrien sortak jaurtitzen dizkie inguruko unitateei.
bundle_eu.properties.block.spectre.description: Kanoi bikoitz erraldoia. Blindajea zulatu dezaketen bala handiak tirokatzen ditu aireko zein lurreko xedeei.
bundle_eu.properties.block.meltdown.description: Laser kanoi erraldoia. Etengabeko laser izpi bat kargatu eta jauritzen die inguruko etsaiei. Hozgarria behar du jarduteko.
bundle_eu.properties.block.repair-point.description: Etengabe konpontzen du inguruko kaltetutako unitate hurbilena.
bundle_eu.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_fi.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_fi.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_fi.properties.sector.groundZero.name: Ground Zero
bundle_fi.properties.sector.craters.name: The Craters
bundle_fi.properties.sector.frozenForest.name: Frozen Forest
bundle_fi.properties.sector.ruinousShores.name: Ruinous Shores
bundle_fi.properties.sector.stainedMountains.name: Stained Mountains
bundle_fi.properties.sector.desolateRift.name: Desolate Rift
bundle_fi.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.name: Nuclear Production Complex
bundle_fi.properties.sector.overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
bundle_fi.properties.sector.tarFields.name: Tar Fields
bundle_fi.properties.sector.saltFlats.name: Salt Flats
bundle_fi.properties.sector.fungalPass.name: Fungal Pass
bundle_fi.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_fi.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_fi.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_fi.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_fi.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_fi.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_fi.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_fi.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_fi.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_fi.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_fi.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_fi.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_fi.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_fi.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_fi.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_fi.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_fi.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_fi.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_fi.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_fi.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_fi.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_fi.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_fi.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_fi.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_fi.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_fi.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_fi.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_fi.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_fi.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_fi.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_fi.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_fi.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_fi.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_fi.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router. Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_fi.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_fi.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_fi.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range and more connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_fi.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_fi.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_fi.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_fi.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_fi.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_fi.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_fi.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_fi.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_fi.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_fi.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_fi.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_fi.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_fi.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_fi.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_fi.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_fi.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fi.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_fi.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_fil.properties.link.discord.description: Ang opisyal na Mindustry Discord chatroom.
bundle_fil.properties.link.trello.description: Opisyal Trello board para sa mga nakalatag na features
bundle_fil.properties.link.itch.io.description: itch.io page na may PC download
bundle_fil.properties.linkfail: 'Di mabuksan ang link!\nKinopya na sa 'yong clipboard ang URL.
bundle_fil.properties.screenshot.invalid: Masiyadong malaki ang mapa; maaaring kulang ang memory para sa screenshot.
bundle_fil.properties.be.update: Mayroong baong Bleeding Edge build na makukuha:
bundle_fil.properties.schematic.replace: Ang schematic sa parehong pangalan ay mayroon na. Gusto mo bang palitan?
bundle_fil.properties.schematic.exists: Ang schematic sa parehong pangalan ay mayroon na.
bundle_fil.properties.schematic.delete.confirm: Ang schematic na'to ay tuluyang mawawala.
bundle_fil.properties.map.delete: Sigurado ka bang buburahin ang mapang "[accent]{0}[]"?
bundle_fil.properties.nearpoint: [[ [scarlet]UMALIS KAAGAD SA DROP POINT[] ]\nmalapit ka nang mamatay
bundle_fil.properties.feature.unsupported: Hindi suportado ng 'yong device ang feature na'to.
bundle_fil.properties.mods.alphainfo: Tandaan mo na ang mga mod ay nasa 'alpha', at[scarlet] maaaring may depekto pa ang mga 'to[].\nI-ulat ang kahit anong depektong matutuklasan mo sa Mindustry GitHub o Discord.
bundle_fil.properties.mods.guide: Gabay para sa Paggawa ng Mod
bundle_fil.properties.mods.reloadexit: Ang laro ay isasara, para mag-reload ng mga mod.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.delete.error: 'Di matanggal ang mod. Maaaring ginagamit pa 'to.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.errors: May mga error na naitala habang ni-lo-load ang nilalaman.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.noerrorplay: [scarlet]May mga mod kang may error.[] Maaaring 'wag munang paganahin ang mga apektadong mod o 'di kaya'y ayusin ang mga error bago maglaro.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.nowdisabled: [scarlet]Ang mod na '{0}' ay ma kulang na mga dependency:[accent] {1}\n[lightgray]Ang mga ito'y kinakailangang i-download muna.\nAng mod na'to ay kusang 'di papaganahin.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.requiresrestart: Ang laro'y magsasaro upang mai-apply ang mga pagbabago sa mod.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.jarwarn: [scarlet]Ang mga mod na gawa sa JAR ay likas na 'di ligtas laruin.[]\nSiguraduhin mong mapapagkatiwalaan ang 'yong pinagkunan nito!
bundle_fil.properties.mod.item.remove: Ang bagay na'to ay parte ng mod na [accent] '{0}'[]. Kung nais mong tanggalin, i-uninstall mo ang mod.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.author: [lightgray]May-akda:[] {0}
bundle_fil.properties.mod.missing: Ang larong 'to ay may nilalaman na mod na in-update kamakailan o binura mo na. Maaaring ma-corrput ang larong 'to. Sigurado ka bang gusto mong i-load 'to?\n[lightgray]Mga Mod:\n{0}
bundle_fil.properties.mod.preview.missing: Bago mong ilathala ang mod sa workshop, dapat maglagay ka nang image preview.\nMaglagay ka ng litratong nagngangalang[accent] preview.png[] sa folder ng mod at subukan mo muli.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.folder.missing: Tanging mga mod lang nasa loob ng folder ay maaaring ma-ilathala sa workshop.\nTo convert any mod into a folder, simply unzip its file into a folder and delete the old zip, then restart your game or reload your mods.
bundle_fil.properties.mod.scripts.disable: Your device does not support mods with scripts. You must disable these mods to play the game.
bundle_fil.properties.name: Name:
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.kick: You have been kicked from the server!
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Outdated server! Ask the host to update!
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.banned: You are banned on this server.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.typeMismatch: This server is not compatible with your build type.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.playerLimit: This server is full. Wait for an empty slot.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: You have been kicked recently.\nWait before connecting again.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: There is someone with that name\nalready on this server.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: You are already on this server! Connecting with two accounts is not permitted.
bundle_fil.properties.server.kicked.customClient: This server does not support custom builds. Download an official version.
bundle_fil.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_fil.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] or [accent]global[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]If you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP, which can be found by googling "my ip" from their device.
bundle_fil.properties.invalidid: Invalid client ID! Submit a bug report.
bundle_fil.properties.server.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this server?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmban: Are you sure you want to ban "{0}[white]"?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmkick: Are you sure you want to kick "{0}[white]"?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmvotekick: Are you sure you want to vote-kick "{0}[white]"?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmunban: Are you sure you want to unban this player?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmadmin: Are you sure you want to make "{0}[white]" an admin?
bundle_fil.properties.confirmunadmin: Are you sure you want to remove admin status from "{0}[white]"?
bundle_fil.properties.joingame.title: Join Game
bundle_fil.properties.save.overwrite: Are you sure you want to overwrite\nthis save slot?
bundle_fil.properties.save.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this save?
bundle_fil.properties.data.import.confirm:
Importing external data will overwrite[scarlet] all[] your current game data.
[accent]This cannot be undone![]

Once the data is imported, your game will exit immediately.

bundle_fil.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_fil.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_fil.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.
