bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Use[accent] [[WASD][] to move.
[accent]Scroll[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
You can also select the drill by tapping [accent][[2][] then [accent][[1][] quickly, regardless of which tab is open.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.
Use the scrollwheel to rotate blocks before placing them.
[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo[] to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_fil.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These obtained resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_fil.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_fil.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical components.
bundle_fil.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_fil.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_fil.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_fil.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_fil.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_fil.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_fil.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_fil.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_fil.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_fil.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_fil.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_fil.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_fil.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_fil.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_fil.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_fil.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_fil.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_fil.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_fil.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_fil.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_fil.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_fil.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_fil.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_fil.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_fil.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_fil.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fil.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fil.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_fil.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_fil.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_fil.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_fil.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_fil.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_fil.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_fil.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_fil.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_fil.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_fil.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_fil.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_fil.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_fil.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_fil.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_fil.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_fil.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_fil.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_fil.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_fil.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_fil.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_fil.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_fil.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_fil.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from any nearby non-transportation block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_fil.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_fil.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_fil.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead, scrap or metaglass flak at enemy units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_fil.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fil.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range shrapnel turret. Fires three piercing blasts at nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_fil.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_fr.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_hu.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_hu.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] or [accent]global[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]If you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP, which can be found by googling "my ip" from their device.

bundle_hu.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_hu.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_hu.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_hu.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Use[accent] [[WASD][] to move.
[accent]Scroll[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
You can also select the drill by tapping [accent][[2][] then [accent][[1][] quickly, regardless of which tab is open.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.
Use the scrollwheel to rotate blocks before placing them.
[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo[] to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_hu.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These obtained resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_hu.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_hu.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_hu.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_hu.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical components.
bundle_hu.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_hu.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_hu.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_hu.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_hu.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_hu.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_hu.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_hu.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_hu.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_hu.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_hu.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_hu.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_hu.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_hu.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_hu.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_hu.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_hu.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_hu.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_hu.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_hu.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_hu.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_hu.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_hu.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_hu.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_hu.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_hu.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_hu.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_hu.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_hu.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_hu.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_hu.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_hu.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_hu.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_hu.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_hu.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_hu.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_hu.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_hu.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_hu.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_hu.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_hu.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_hu.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_hu.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_hu.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_hu.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_hu.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_hu.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_hu.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_hu.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_hu.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_hu.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_hu.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_hu.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_hu.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_hu.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_hu.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_hu.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_hu.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_hu.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_hu.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_hu.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_hu.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_hu.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_hu.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_hu.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_hu.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_hu.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_hu.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle_hu.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_hu.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_hu.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_hu.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_hu.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_hu.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_hu.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_hu.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_hu.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_hu.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_hu.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_hu.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_hu.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_hu.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_hu.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_hu.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_hu.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_hu.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_hu.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_hu.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_hu.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_hu.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_hu.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_hu.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_hu.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_hu.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from any nearby non-transportation block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_hu.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_hu.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_hu.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_hu.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead, scrap or metaglass flak at enemy units.
bundle_hu.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_hu.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_hu.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_hu.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_hu.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_hu.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_hu.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_hu.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_hu.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_hu.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_hu.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_hu.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_hu.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_in_ID.properties.host.info:
Tombol [accent]host[] akan membuat server sementara di port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Semua orang yang memiliki [lightgray]Wi-Fi atau jaringan lokal[] akan bisa melihat server anda di daftar server mereka.

Jika Anda ingin pemain dari mana saja memasuki servermu dengan IP, dibutuhkan untuk melakukan [accent]port forwarding[].

[lightgray]Diingat: Jika seseorang mengalami masalah memasuki permainan LAN-mu, pastikan Anda telah mengizinkan Mindustry akses ke jaringan lokalmu di pengaturan firewall.
bundle_in_ID.properties.join.info:
Disini, Anda bisa memasuki [accent]server IP[], atau menemukan [accent]server lokal[] untuk bermain bersama.
LAN dan WAN mendukung permainan bersama.

[lightgray]Ingat: Tidak ada daftar server global; jika anda ingin bergabung dengan seseorang memakai IP, Anda perlu menanyakan host tentang IP mereka.

bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.groundZero.description: lokasi yang optimal untuk bermain satu kali lagi. Sangat sedikit musuh. Beberapa sumber daya.\nKumpulkan timah dan tembaga sebanyak yang anda bisa.\nPindah.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: disini, dekat dengan gunung, spora spora sudah menyebar. Temperatur yang sangat rendah tidak dapat mempertahankan selamanya.\n\nBerusaha untuk kekuatan. Bangun generator pembakaran. Pelajari cara menggunakan mender.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_in_ID.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_in_ID.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Anda yakin ingin menghapus data ini?\nWaktu tidak bisa diulang kembali!
bundle_in_ID.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]PERINGATAN![]\nIni akan menghapus semua data permainan, termasuk simpanan, peta, bukaan dan keybind.\nSetelah Anda menekan 'ok' permainan akan menghapus semua data dan keluar otomatis.
