bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin met het[accent] mijnen van koper[]. Klik op een vakje met koper om het te mijnen.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Sleep over het scherm om te bewegen.
[accent]Knijp met 2 vingers [] om in en uit te zoomen.
Begin met het[accent] mijnen van koper[]. Beweeg dichterbij, en klik er dan op.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill: Met de hand mijnen is inefficient.\n[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch voor je mijnen.\nPlaats een boor op koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Met de hand mijnen is inefficient.
[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch voor je mijnen.
Zoek de boren rechts onderin.
Selecter de[accent] mechanische boor[].
Plaats het op de koper door erop te klikken, druk dan op het[accent] vinkje[] om het bouwen te bevestigen.
Klik op de[accent] X knop[] om het te anuleren.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Elk blok heeft andere statistieken. Elke boor kan enkel bepaalde dingen mijnen.
Om het van een blok te checken,[accent] druk op de "?" knop terwijl je het blok vast hebt.[]

[accent]Lees de statatistieken van de Mechanische Boor maar eens.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core/basis te krijgen.\nLeg een lijn aan van je boren tot aan je core/basis.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core/basis te krijgen.
Leg een lijn aan van je boren tot aan je core/basis.
[accent] Doe dit door je vinger een paar seconden stil te houden[] en dan in een richting te slepen.

[accent]{0}/{1} Lopende banden worden in 1x geplaatst
[accent]0/1 items afgeleverd
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensieve gebouwen moeten worden gebouwd tegen de[lightgray] vijand[].\nBouw een duo kannon bij je basis.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo's hebben[accent] koperen ammunitie []nodig om te schieten.\nPlaats een drill ernaast om het van koper te voorzien.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause:
Tijdens een gevecht is het mogelijk[accent] het spel te pauzeren.[]
Je kan nog wel je gebouwen plannen.

[accent]Pauzeer het spel (spatie) nu.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]Houd rechts-klik ingedrukt[] om alle geselecteerde blokken te vernietigen.[]

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]klik op de hamer voor vernietigigs-mode[], klik dan op een blok om het te breken.
Vernietig een heel gebied door je vinger een paar seconden still te houden en dan te slepen in een richting.
Klik dan op het vinkje om het te bevestigen.

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In sommige situaties, is het nodig om items uit een blok te kunnen pakken.
Om dit te doen, [accent]klik je op een blok[] waar items in zitten, en dan [accent]op het item te klikken[] in het zwarte menu.
Meerdere items tegelijk kan je eruit halen door [accent]het ingedrukt te houden[].

[accent]Pak wat koper uit de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.deposit: Je kan de items weer terugstoppen door van je schip het terug te slepen naar waar je het wilt.\n\n[accent]Stop het nu weer terug in de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves: De[lightgray] vijand[] naderd.\n\nVerdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Bouw meer verdedigingen.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
De[lightgray] vijand[] naderd.

Verdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Je schip schiet automatisch op vijanden.
Bouw meer verdedigingen, en mine meer koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.launch:
Tijdens sommige waves, kan je je core[accent] lanceren[], hiermee verlaat je de basis permanent[accent] maar je neemt wel alles dat in de core zit met je mee.[]
Met deze grondstoffen kan je nieuwe technologieÃ«n onderzoeken.

[accent]Druk op de lanceerknop.
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: Een nuttig materiaal voor gebouwen. Wordt erg vaak in blokken gebruikt.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: Een basismateriaal. Wordt vaak gebruikt in elektronica en vloeistoftransport.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.steam-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Genereert veel meer zonne-energie dan een normale zonnepaneel, maar is ook veel duurder om te bouwen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Genereert super veel elektriciteit van radioactief thorium. Moet constant gekoeld worden. Als het oververhit raakt explodeert het met een grote knal. Genereert meer energie naarmate het voller zit, met normale productie op halve capaciteit.
bundle_nl.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.preview.missing: Voordat je de mod publiceert moet je een afbeelding voor de voorvertoning toevoegen.\nPlaats een afbeelding met de naam[accent] preview.png[] in de modfolder.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.folder.missing: Mods kunnen enkel gepubliceerd worden in foldervorm.\nOm een mod in foldervorm te zetten exporteer je het modbestand uit de zipfile en verwijder je de oude zipfile. Herlaad vervolgens je mods of herstart het spel.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.host.info:
Ook de [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [lightgray]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

Als je wil dat personen kunnen verbinden met je server van ergens anders via IP. Dan is [accent]port forwarding[] is nodig.

[lightgray]Nota: Als iemand problemen heeft met het verbinden tot je LAN spel, zorg dan dat mindustry toestemming heeft tot je lokale netwerk in de Firewall instellingen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.join.info: Hier kan je een [accent]server IP[] invullen waarmee je wil verbinden. Je kan hier ook verbinden met servers op je [accent]lokale netwerk[]. LAN en WAN multiplayer wordt ondersteund.\n\n[lightgray]Belangrijk: er is geen automatische globale server lijst; als je met iemand wil verbinden via een IP adres moet je zijn/haar IP adres vragen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.hosts.none: [lightgray]Geen games op je lokale netwerk gevonden.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.invalidid: Ongeldige client ID! Verstuur een bug report!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.delete: Ben je zeker dat je deze sever wil verwijderen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmban: Ben je zeker dat je deze speler wilt verbannen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmkick: Ben je zeker dat je deze speler van de server wilt gooien?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmvotekick: Ben je zeker dat je een stemming wilt starten om deze speler uit de server to gooien?

bundle_nl_BE.properties.save.delete.confirm: Ben je zeker dat je deze save wil verwijderen?

bundle_nl_BE.properties.quit.confirm.tutorial: Ben je zeker dat je nu weet wat je doet?\nDe tutorial kan opnieuw gestart worden via[accent] Instellingen->Spel->Herneem Tutorial.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.resumebuilding: [scarlet][[{0}][] om verder te gaan met bouwen
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.delete.confirm: Weet je zeker dat je deze kaart wilt verwijderen? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden!

bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers [] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill: Handmatig delven is inefficiÃ«nt.\n[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch delven.\nPlaats er een op een koperader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Transportbanden[] worden gebruikt om artikelen naar de kern te transporteren.\nMaak een lijn van transportbanden van de boor tot de kern.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.turret: Er moeten verdedigingsstructuren worden gebouwd om de[lightgray] vijand[]af te weren.\nBouw een duo geschutstoren in de buurt van je basis.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo geschutstorens hebben[accent] koper ammunitie []nodig om te schieten.\nPlaats een boor naast de geschutstoren om het van gedolven koper te voorzien.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves: De [lightgray] vijand[] nadert.\n\nVerdedig jouw kern voor 2 golven. Bouw meer geschutstorens.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.steam-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_pt_PT.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_sv.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_sv.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_sv.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_sv.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_sv.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
